about.title: About me | Cakes by Katie
about.description: I'm a cake maker in Thatcham, West Berkshire, offering high quality bespoke cakes for birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, christenings, or any occasion.

portfolio.title: Portfolio | Cakes by Katie
portfolio.description: See all the high quality bespoke cakes and cupcakes I have made for birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, corporate events and other occasions. I am based in Thatcham, West Berkshire, near Newbury and Reading.

testimonials.title: Testimonials | Cakes by Katie
testimonials.description: Read some of the glowing testimonials I have received for my bespoke cakes and cupcakes from my many wonderful customers.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions | Cakes by Katie
faqs.description: Find the answers to some questions I commonly get asked by my customers.

questions.question: Where are you based?
questions.answer: I'm based in Thatcham, West Berkshire, so I am in easy reach of Basingstoke, Newbury, Reading, and their surrounding vicinities such as Basildon, Bucklebury, Coldash, Didcot, Donnington, Hungerford, Pangbourne, Purley, Sulhampstead, Tadley, Theale, Tidmarsh and Tilehurst.

questions.question: What occasions do you cater for?
questions.answer: I can make cakes for all occasions! Have you got a wedding, birthday or anniversary coming up? Maybe a religious occasion such as a christening, first communion or bar/bat mitzvah? Is there a little one involved - do you need a baby shower, gender reveal or cake smash cake? How about a cake to celebrate Christmas, Easter, Halloween or Valentine's Day? Or maybe you need something completely different? Get in touch with me at katie@cakesbykatie.co.uk and we'll start planning for your occasion!

questions.question: What finishes do you provide?
questions.answer: Cakes can be finished in either buttercream or fondant. I also provide semi naked cakes for weddings.

questions.question: Do you cater for any special dietary requirements?
questions.answer: Yes, I offer flavour ranges for gluten free, dairy free, vegan and eggless diets. I encourage you to get in touch and we can discuss whatever requirements you have. Please note that whilst the cakes will be made using free from products, they're made in a kitchen where the allergens are present.

questions.question: Do you deliver?
questions.answer: Wedding cakes will be delivered and set up at the venue. All other cakes are on a collection basis, but I can deliver for a fee.

questions.question: What products do you offer?
questions.answer: I offer wedding cakes, celebration cakes and cupcakes in a range of flavours. I don't produce fresh cream cakes and fresh fruit is only an option for wedding orders. I also offer wedding favours.

questions.question: How do I order a cake?
questions.answer: Get in touch with me at katie@cakesbykatie.co.uk and we'll start discussing your perfect cake/cupcakes!

questions.question: What cake design should I go for?
questions.answer: Whether you know exactly what you want or have absolutely no idea, I'll work with you to create the perfect design for your occasion. If you're looking for inspiration why not check out my portfolio page?

questions.question: What are your payment terms?
questions.answer: Payment is by bank transfer. For celebration cakes and cupcakes I ask for a 50% deposit on order confirmation to secure your booking with the balance payable 14 days prior to collection/delivery. For wedding cakes, a £100 date reservation deposit is payable when you decide to book with me, with the balance due 30 days before your wedding. All deposits and final balances are non-refundable. Please see full Terms & Conditions.

awards.title: News and Awards | Cakes by Katie
awards.description: Cakes by Katie, a cake maker in Thatcham, West Berkshire, is honoured to have received a variety of awards for their wedding cakes, celebration cakes and cupcakes.

posts.title: The United Kingdom Weddings & Honeymoons Awards 2025
posts.subtitle:
Cakes by Katie
Wedding Cake Designer (Finalist)
posts.text: I was delighted to be a finalist in the 'Wedding Cake Designer' category of the UK Weddings and Honeymoons Awards 2025, which were held at The Dorchester Hotel in Mayfair, London in February. These awards recognise excellence in the wedding and honeymoon industries.

posts.title: South England Prestige Awards 2024/25
posts.subtitle:
Cakes by Katie
Cake Designer of the Year
posts.text: The Prestige Awards recognise small and medium-sized businesses that have proven to be the best in their market over the past 12 months. The judging panel base their decision upon areas such as service excellence, quality of the product/service provided, innovative practices, value, ethical or sustainable methods of working, as well as consistency in performance. The winners selected are those who can best demonstrate their strengths in these areas.

posts.title: Luxlife Food & Drinks Awards 2024
posts.subtitle:
Cakes by Katie
Best Bespoke Celebration Cake Bakery - Berkshire
posts.text: Luxury Lifestyle Awards is a global award program that selects, recognises, celebrates and promotes the best luxury goods and services worldwide. Through comprehensive market research and a meticulous nomination and selection process, excellence is identified and honoured.

image.alt: Luxlife Food & Drinks Awards Winner Banner

posts.title: Weddings & Honeymoons - February/March 2024
posts.subtitle: Top Cake Maker in Berkshire
posts.text: I had the privilege of being featured in Weddings & Honeymoons Edition 26. The article ‘Baked with love’ gathered the top ten cake makers in the UK.

posts.title: The United Kingdom Weddings & Honeymoons Awards 2024
posts.subtitle:
Cakes by Katie
Rising Star (Finalist)
posts.text: The UKWHA recognise excellence in the wedding and honeymoon industries. I was honoured to be a finalist in the ‘Rising Star’ category of the UKWHA 2024 awards which was held at a spectacular gala evening at Kew Gardens in February 2024.

image.alt: The United Kingdom Weddings & Honeymoons Awards 2024 'Rising Star' finalist rosette

occasions.title: Occasions | Cakes by Katie
occasions.description: I'm a cake maker in Thatcham, near Newbury and Reading, West Berkshire, offering high quality bespoke cakes for birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, corporate events, or any occasion.

birthday.title: Birthday cakes and cupcakes | Cakes by Katie
birthday.description: Cakes by Katie is a cake maker in Thatcham, Berkshire, near Newbury and Reading, offering bespoke birthday cakes and cupcakes in a wide range of flavours and catering for specific dietary requirements.

products.name: Buttercream cakes
products.description: Buttercream cakes are finished completely in buttercream in either one or more colours to produce the desired effect. The finish can be smooth or textured.

products.name: Fondant cakes
products.description: Cakes are covered in a smooth layer of sugarpaste and can be decorated with flowers, objects or figures modelled from fondant icing.

products.name: Themed cakes
products.description: Themed cakes allow the design to be tailored to the recipient in terms of their likes, hobbies and personality for example.

products.name: Birthday cupcakes
products.description: Birthday cupcakes are easy to share and customise with a decoration of your choice. If some of your party have dietary requirements, cupcakes are a good way to cater for them separately. Cupcakes can also make a special birthday gift and can be presented in a gift box finished with ribbon and a bow and candle.

products.name: Carved cakes
products.description: Cut to the desired shape, hand carved cakes bring to life the cake design.

products.name: Edible images
products.description: Edible images can be placed on either a buttercream or fondant finished cake. They offer greater design flexibility and are cheaper than fondant models. An edible image of a favourite photograph will also add that personal touch.

products.name: Airbrushing
products.description: Airbrushing adds an exciting dimension to a fondant cake, introducing additional colour either as an abstract or block design. Blending the colours can also add depth.

products.name: Pinata cakes
products.description: These cakes have a hidden surprise and have a special appeal to children. They can be filled with sweets or chocolate.

products.name: Balloons
products.description: Topping the cake with a balloon gives an extra touch.

cta.text: Want a quote for a birthday cake?

testimonial.text: I just wanted to say thank you so much for making the cake for my friend's baby shower! It looked amazing, tasted incredible and the mum-to-be was very happy.
testimonial.name: Sam

testimonial.text: I just wanted to say a huge thank you for our wedding cake on Sunday, it was absolutely perfect. It looked beautiful and was everything we had imagined (and more!), and every single layer tasted amazing. We had so many guests comment on how good it was, and I am so glad we chose you to make it for us. You were so lovely to work with from start to finish, and it honestly felt so special seeing the cake on the day after all the planning. Apologies about the cake ribbon though - Chloe saved the day and it was just as beautiful as I had planned.
testimonial.name: Lotty & George

testimonial.text: Just a quick message to say thank you so much for making our wedding cake. So many of our guests commented upon how beautiful it was and also how amazing it tasted; and having now sampled quite a bit of it ourselves (!), we can confirm that it was absolutely delicious.
testimonial.name: Olly & Niamh

youre-the-chosen-one.name: You're The Chosen One
youre-the-chosen-one.description: Second Photo - Photographer: Steffen Milsom Photography (steffenmilsomphotography.co.uk)

testimonial.text: I just wanted to say thank you so much for the cake! It's literally perfect and better than the photos, thank you!!
testimonial.name: Chloe

testimonial.text: I’d like to thank you so much for your excellent service. The cake décor looked absolutely stunning, and I was truly delighted with the final result. Everyone loved the cake, we served it to all our guests, and many even went back for a second slice! It was a real highlight of the day. Thank you again for your incredible work and attention to detail.
testimonial.name: Eliane & Oliver

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say thank you so so much for our amazing wedding cake! Everyone commented on it and how nice it was! It was better than we could have ever expected!
testimonial.name: Jess

testimonial.text: Thank you so much for the cake! It was delicious, so beautiful and exactly what we wanted, and everyone loved it so much! Most people didn’t realise it was vegan it was that good!
testimonial.name: Anna & Elias

the-one-where-its-your-birthday.name: The One Where It's Your Birthday

testimonial.text: We just wanted to say a massive thank you for the cake last Saturday, it looked absolutely stunning and our guests were raving about how good it tasted. Thankfully we've got some stashed in our freezer to look forward to eating once we're back from honeymoon!
testimonial.name: Leah & Ryan

testimonial.text: The cake was absolutely stunning and matched the decor perfectly. We are glad to have had your work as a part of our special day.
testimonial.name: Zac & Kemi

testimonial.text: We couldn’t have asked for a more perfect wedding cake! Not only was it stunningly beautiful but it tasted absolutely amazing. Every detail was crafted with care and our guests couldn’t stop talking about it. You truly made our vision come to life and we are so grateful for your talent and professionalism. Thank you for being part of our special day and creating such a memorable centrepiece!
testimonial.name: Frankie &  Josh

testimonial.text: Thank you so much Katie, the cake was stunning, so beautiful and tasted delicious too! It all went the day it was cut! We'll certainly be ordering more cakes from you and highly recommending you to all our family and friends.
testimonial.name: Nikki

testimonial.text: I just wanted to thank you for the gorgeous cupcakes on Saturday.  They looked perfect and tasted absolutely delicious.  Everyone really enjoyed them (including my very naughty dog who swiped one of the remaining few off the table when we got home).  I'm sorry I didn't get to see you on Saturday, but thank you for doing such a fantastic and professional job. Many, many thanks.
testimonial.name: Victoria & Nicholas

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say an enormous thank you for Isabella's castle cake. It was incredible! I'll be back in touch for my son's birthday in June.
testimonial.name: Charlotte

testimonial.text: We just wanted to say a big thank you for our lovely wedding cake and for all your help in the build up to the day! The cake looked and tasted amazing!
testimonial.name: Connie & Matt

testimonial.text: Thank you so much for the cakes. They went down a treat. They were delicious. Again thank you so much!
testimonial.name: Elle & Harley

testimonial.text: The Spider-Man cake not only looked awesome but also tasted delicious. A great combination!
testimonial.name: Hannah

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say a massive thank you for making my mum's 60th birthday cake…it was amazing, it looked fab and tasted amazing. Your buttercream is to die for…my mum was over the moon with it.
testimonial.name: Penny

testimonial.text: We wanted to thank you for the beautiful cake you made for our wedding. The design was elegant and exactly what we had hoped for. The cake tasted wonderful as well — our guests really enjoyed it and many mentioned how delicious it was. We truly appreciate your care and attention to detail in bringing everything together. It was a pleasure working with you and having your creation as part of our special day.
testimonial.name: Angel & Edwin

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say a big thank you on behalf of my son and daughter-in-law for the cake. It was incredible and they were delighted with it.
testimonial.name: Anne

testimonial.text: I just wanted to write to say thank you for Elsie's christening cake, it was so beautiful and delicious. We received so many compliments from the guests everyone was so impressed and our daughter was thrilled, Without doubt we will be returning for our next big celebration and I will recommend you to everyone :) Thank you again Katie for making us such a beautiful cake.
testimonial.name: Nikki

testimonial.text: Wanted to say a huge thank you for the cakes. They were amazing and went down very well!
testimonial.name: Paul

testimonial.text: We just wanted to send a quick message to say thank you for providing our amazing wedding cake yesterday, as we never ended up crossing paths during the day. It looked fantastic and tasted great - there wasn't much left!
testimonial.name: Hannah & Ben

testimonial.text: Again massive thank you for the cupcakes. Everyone loved them as they were truly delicious!
testimonial.name: Marianna, Freixenet Copestick Limited

testimonial.text: Katie was brilliant at taking time to talk through with me the best cake concept and ideas for our corporate event. The finished cake was safely delivered to our venue and was absolutely stunning! Even better, it tasted so good. It really was the centrepiece for our event that we hoped for, thank you Katie!
testimonial.name: Bex, Barracuda, Reading

testimonial.text: I just wanted to say the cake was absolutely delicious and lovely. No one thought it was gluten free, that's how tasty it was. Thank you so much. You are great at what you do.
testimonial.name: Pam

testimonial.text: I just wanted to thank you very much for the lovely cake you made for me - it was amazing and it got so many compliments. Very grateful - thanks.
testimonial.name: Jane

testimonial.text: It was absolutely amazing, tasted fantastic, best cake I've ever eaten. Presentation, I have no words, 10 out of 10. I've got your number in my contacts, lots of people asked me last night where I got the cake from and I recommend you. Delicious!!!
testimonial.name: Dave

testimonial.text: My husband and I got married on 13.7.24 and Katie created (I say "created" rather than "made" because it was a visual spectacle as well as something delicious to eat!) our wedding cake. My grandmother actually found Katie and booked her as a surprise for us, revealing it at our engagement party. She said that she had spoken to so many bakers and none of them seemed to care just as much as Katie, who understood that this wasn't just a cake, it was a part of the most important day of our lives. Katie has been so brilliant at being communicative. Nothing was too much bother and, after our consultation, she knew exactly the kind of thing I was looking for. When I asked if we could put little Disney ears on the bottom tier without it being too much, she said "absolutely," and did it in a way that was tasteful and really adorable. I loved our tasting, too, as she sent them through the post and we got to sample a lot of different (and delicious) flavours. From then I knew we were in safe hands! The cake was absolutely stunning to look at and to eat. Guests adored it (specifically the carrot cake!) and I couldn't be happier. Katie, thank you so much for your flexibility, your listening skills, your talent and your patience with us. We really feel you cared about our wedding day and giving us the perfect cake that encapsulated our personalities. If you're looking for someone to create a really special cake (and one that tastes amazing) for an event, we couldn't recommend Katie highly enough!
testimonial.name: Nadine & David

testimonial.text: I just wanted to say a BIG thank you for your beautiful cake at our reception last week. Everyone absolutely loved it.
testimonial.name: Faraz & Zara

petals-and-promises.name: Petals & Promises
petals-and-promises.description: First photo taken by Simon Withyman Photography

testimonial.text: Thank you so much for the stunning wedding cake, we were all delighted with it!
testimonial.name: June

testimonial.text: I cannot recommend the wedding cake made by Cakes by Katie highly enough! It was absolutely stunning to look at and tasted even better than it looked. Our guests were raving about it all night! Katie was an absolute pleasure to work with throughout the entire process. She listened and understood our vision and created a cake that was exactly what we had in mind. Thank you so much for creating such a memorable and delicious centrepiece for our wedding!
testimonial.name: Jason, Benson

testimonial.text: Katie did a fantastic job of creating our wedding cake, which was just nearby at Wasing Park. The cake looked fantastic and she was really professional and responsive in making sure it was exactly what we wanted. She catered to my husband's nut allergy whilst still being able to offer us a wide range of flavours and the cake absolutely disappeared on the day as everyone loved it! Her pricing is also really reasonable compared to some of the specialist wedding cake providers I looked at.  I'd highly recommend her
testimonial.name: Ellie & Ed

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say a huge thank you for the cake you made for us.  It was absolutely stunning and delicious!
testimonial.name: Katherine

testimonial.text: From the start Katie was extremely helpful with her ideas and very professional. The cake tasted delicious and my daughter was over the moon. I will certainly be using Katie again. Highly recommend.
testimonial.name: Harriet

testimonial.text: THANK YOU SO MUCH for the cake. It looked beautiful thank you and it's all gone! Everyone enjoyed eating it. Sorry I didn't see you Saturday, but thank you, it was fantastic!!
testimonial.name: Robyn

testimonial.text: The most delicious cake for a 90th bday! Thankyou so much. I will definately be in touch again!
testimonial.name: Louise

testimonial.text: I wanted to send a note to say thank you very much for the cake! It looked amazing and it was really delicious.
testimonial.name: Emma

testimonial.text: Thank you so much for the stunning cake. It was absolutely beautiful and everyone commented how delicious it was.
testimonial.name: Lisa

testimonial.text: Just to say that the cake and favours were amazing. Soo happy with them. Thank you!! All the guests spoke very highly of the cake and loved the cookies design and taste.
testimonial.name: Emma

testimonial.text: Thank you! Also my husband wanted me to let you know how brilliant he thought the cake was.
testimonial.name: Hazel

testimonial.text: Just to let you know Rob loved the cake and says it's' the best carrot cake he has had. Thank you so much.
testimonial.name: Laura

testimonial.text: I just wanted to say thank you so much, the cakes were beautiful and we got rave reviews from the guests too!
testimonial.name: Iona

testimonial.text: My husband picked up a cake today that you made for my birthday! It is gorgeous! I love it! Thank you so much!
testimonial.name: Emma

testimonial.text: Just wanted to drop you a note to say thanks again for the cupcakes. My wife really loved them and they tasted fantastic too.
testimonial.name: David

testimonial.text: I just wanted to say thank you so much again for the amazing cake you made!  Sam absolutely loved it and was so surprised!  The cake was delicious as well and went down a treat!  Thank you!
testimonial.name: Lizzie

testimonial.text: Thank you for making the birthday cake for my nephew Richard's birthday. It looked amazing and tasted delicious! Thank you again.
testimonial.name: Chris

testimonial.text: The giant cupcake and cupcakes were delicious everyone loved them and all the different decorations. All gone!
testimonial.name: Beryl

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say a massive thank you for the fantastic birthday cake that you made for Lynn. It was fantastic and Lynn loved it (in fact all her colleagues loved it as well), I was lucky to get a piece! And they all loved the fact that you managed to put the picture of Magic on as well. You are definitely our go to for any other cake requirements.

testimonial.text: I just want to say a massive Thank you to you for my amazing New York cake that was arranged for you to make me for my birthday surprise. I was absolutely blown away by it and didn't want to cut it. I finally cut it and it is absolutely delicious. It tastes as good as it looks. I can't thank you enough, it made my birthday.

testimonial.text: Just want to say thank you very much for the cake, you did a brilliant job and everyone loved it. Sponge was delicious.

testimonial.text: Everything went fantastically well yesterday evening. Clare was delighted and truly Wowed. The cake was an absolute show stopper. Thank you for the efforts you have made and the great level of communication and time you have given. Your expertise and passion shine through, I am proud to say I bought a cake from Cakes by Katie.
testimonial.name: James

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say thanks for such a fabulous cake! My daughter loved it and we all think it's delicious.
testimonial.name: Ellie

testimonial.text: Thank you so much Katie. What an amazing cake!! Presented so lovely and tastes amazing.
testimonial.name: Mat

testimonial.text: Just to say my wife loved both the decoration and the taste of the cake you baked for her 70th birthday. Thank you so much!
testimonial.name: Peter

testimonial.text: The most BEAUTIFUL and DELICIOUS cake, thank you so much. It was perfect and everyone asked who made it.
testimonial.name: Isabella

testimonial.text: Just to say thank you again for such a beautiful cake, really lovely.
testimonial.name: Ruth

testimonial.text: The cake you made for Callum's 21st was awesome - thank you.
testimonial.name: Sandy

testimonial.text: Just to let you know everyone thought the cakes were delicious and decorated beautifully. They looked great on the cake stand.
testimonial.name: Sam

testimonial.text: Katie was amazingly helpful in helping me find a great food gift for my teenage daughter attending school in Cold Ash. She was able to accommodate all our dietary needs with beautiful and delicious cupcakes. Also, I mistyped my daughter's birthday – Katie figured it out, and she delivered 24 delicious cupcakes on time (and on the right day)!! My daughter and her friends loved the treats, and we will order more soon. Katie, thank you for the great experience and for making my daughter's birthday special! The photo speaks for itself!
testimonial.name: Steve

testimonial.text: I just wanted to say a huge thank you for the delicious chocolate cake you made for me. It was exactly what I wanted and was very much enjoyed by us all!
testimonial.name: Carolyn

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say thank you for the amazing cake. You got the brief absolutely spot on and it became the centrepiece of the party, everyone commented on how good it tasted. The birthday girl was really happy.
testimonial.name: Neil

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say thank you so much for making the cake! It was absolutely delicious and Emily loved the design.
testimonial.name: Alex

testimonial.text: Thank you so much for making the amazing birthday cake for Nic's birthday! She was over the moon with it. We took it with us to her mother's for tea and cake and everyone was amazed at how well presented it was. It tasted amazing too.
testimonial.name: Scott

testimonial.text: Another party and another incredible cake, thank you so much for William's cake - he loved it and the best sponge!
testimonial.name: Sarah

testimonial.text: The cake was a wonderful success. Looked and tasted beautiful! Thanks Katie
testimonial.name: Anne

testimonial.text: Thank you for the fantastic cakes! The boys loved them. So many compliments from the parents on how tasty the cake was.
testimonial.name: Lisa

testimonial.text: The cake is incredible. Thank you so much!! Delicious!
testimonial.name: Rob

testimonial.text: Thank you SO much for the lion cake last weekend, it was absolutely delicious, lots of compliments and everyone loved it - thank you!
testimonial.name: Sarah

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say a very big thank you for creating a wonderful first birthday cake for George. I had so many people asking where it was from, and it tasted delicious. Needless to say it's all gone!
testimonial.name: Lucy

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say thank you so much, the cupcakes were amazing and my partner was really surprised! They didn't last long at all. We'll definitely be using you again for future events/birthdays!
testimonial.name: Alexandra

testimonial.text: Just wanted to say thank you for doing our birthday cake! It looked and tasted amazing, and your suggestions of how much we'd need were spot on as there was just a few slices left (which got eaten today!!).
testimonial.name: Kristy

testimonial.text: Just wanted to thank you for the birthday cakes. They were fabulous! They looked amazing and also tasted wonderful. I was lucky to get a piece to try myself as they were so popular with everyone.
testimonial.name: Sue

milk-float.name: The Fastest Milk Float in the West

a-touch-of-pink-with-chocolate.name: A Touch of Pink with Chocolate

testimonial.text: Just to say my customer was very complimentary about your cake, so thank you so much for squeezing us in. Will definitely be using your services again.
testimonial.name: Forever and a day Events

a-touch-of-pink-birthday-edition.name: A Touch of Pink - Birthday Edition

testimonial.text: Just wanted to thank you for the wonderful cake! It was perfect and tasted amazing.
testimonial.name: Claire

testimonial.text: Just to say thank you for the beautiful and delicious birthday cake you delivered to me yesterday.  My daughter and the family loved the cake and we will definitely recommend you.
testimonial.name: Lynne

testimonial.text: The cake was splendid... AND delicious. Thank you soooo much Katie. Half gone! Lots left to enjoy! I shall recommend you to anyone who needs a special cake for a special occasion.
testimonial.name: Marilyn

a-touch-of-pink-with-chocolate.name: A Touch of Pink with Chocolate

testimonial.text: Thank you for the lovely chocolate cake. It was so moist and delicious and everyone enjoyed it
testimonial.name: Maureen

ttmc-cupcakes.name: The Traffic Management Company Corporate Cupcakes

testimonial.text: I just wanted to say a very big thank you for the lovely "old suitcase" cake you made for my son's 30th birthday/bon voyage party. I know that I didn't give you much advanced notice and I'm so pleased you were able to make it. A lot of guests asked me where I had bought the cake from as they were very impressed by all the details in the decoration, plus it tasted really great when we cut in to it.
testimonial.name: Yvonne

testimonial.text: Thank you so much for the lime birthday cake. It was beautifully presented and absolutely delicious.
testimonial.name: Caroline

testimonial.text: Just to say a Big Thank you for making us this superb wedding anniversary cake. We can see that you have gone that extra mile for us; everyone at the party just loved it.
testimonial.name: Lilian & David

testimonial.text: Thank you very much for the lovely cake, it was absolutely gorgeous in all the possible ways. Everybody really enjoyed it and admired your work.
testimonial.name: Rosemary

testimonial.text: The cake was a great success. Everyone was very complimentary about it. It tasted so good too.
testimonial.name: Vanessa

easter-surprise.name: Easter Surprise
easter-surprise.description: You may have just stumbled upon the Easter Bunny's secret stash…
